channel.title: Hybridscape The failure version
channel.description:
well i simply cannot be bothered to work on this project atm and its pretty useless just sitting on my hdd. so here is hybridscape the failure version
why it dosnt work?: walking its stuffed.
whats different about it: we remove the isaac crap from packets. not that hard too do just remove it from the client as well. (a.k.a Stream class)
http://dnd.no-ip.org/Hybridscape-failure.rar

item.title: Hybridscape The failure version
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Hmm. If anyone finds the problem (which I’ve spent a lot of time looking for) then please tell us where it is.

Basically it would never find the vertex. However I looked through the implementation of PacketHandler that takes care of walking, and there’s nothing wrong there. There shouldn’t be anything wrong with the conversion from absolute to relative coordinates either (that code was basically taken from the current ‘servers’) or anything like that. Odds are it’s a stupid little bug that has slipped past us on many occasions.

Good luck. Have fun with it (if it’s the version that I think it is, then it’ll have the basis for inventories, banks, equipment screens, friends chat and so on).

Read full topic
